sounds: Feel the wrath of the witch!
Oh how you will regret to have disturbed me!
I will teach them all to leave me alone!
name: Incredibly Old Witch
behaviour: Like a common [[Witch]], she keeps a distance from you but doesn't run away completely. Also she switch target often.
strategy:
She does not do any damage nor can she be killed.
{{JSpoiler|Part of [[Donkey]] taming method.}}
